content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why was an agreement not reached?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] An agreement was not reached because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was seeking a higher price than my final offer of 500 Euros.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, at 8. There was no personal dislike or conflict, and the negotiation was conducted in a professional manner.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point of the negotiation. The negotiation was conducted in a professional manner with no personal bias or offense.
name: Max Müller
